markdownRemark.html:
Thanyatorn Leethamchayo (Tangkwa) is currently an undergraduate student at the Department of Biomedical Engineering, Mahidol University.

She is interested in image detection with deep learning. Now, she is working on a senior project with Korrawiz and Piraya with a topic of "Development of deep learning and image detection platform for bacteria treated with antibiotics by using microscope image".
